notify.title: Service Upgrade
notify.content:
Due to the increase in operating costs, price adjustments will be carried out gradually starting from February 2025.
    The trial period for membership has been extended from 3 days to 6 days, and no fees will be charged for refunds during the trial period.
    It is recommended that tourists who haven't experienced the Pro membership yet enjoy the exclusive privileges to the fullest during these 6 days.
